solutions.title: Track stress eating triggers with heart data
solutions.prompt: I want to identify patterns between my stress and emotional eating. I can share my Apple Watch heart rate data from the past week (times when my heart rate was elevated). Help me create a simple tracking system to spot connections between high-stress moments and food cravings, then suggest healthier coping strategies for each trigger situation.

solutions.title: Create personalized stress-response action cards
solutions.prompt: Help me create 5 quick-action cards for emotional eating moments. Each card should have: 1) A 2-minute calming activity 2) A positive self-talk phrase 3) A healthy alternative to stress eating. Make them practical enough that I can save them on my phone and actually use them when cravings hit.

solutions.title: Link movement goals to emotional wellbeing
solutions.prompt: I use an Apple Watch and notice I feel less stressed on days I move more. Looking at my activity rings and step counts, help me design a realistic daily movement plan specifically for stress management. Include small movement breaks I can use instead of reaching for food when stressed.

solutions.title: Draft mindful eating conversation scripts
solutions.prompt: Help me create three different internal dialogue scripts for when I'm about to stress eat. Each script should help me pause, assess if I'm actually hungry, and make a conscious choice. Make them short enough to memorize and realistic to use in the moment.

solutions.title: Design stress-tracking experiment with biometrics
solutions.prompt: I want to run a 5-day experiment using my Apple Watch to understand my stress patterns. Help me create a plan to: 1) Screenshot my heart rate data at key times 2) Note what triggered my stress 3) Record whether I turned to food. Then help me analyze this data to find better coping strategies. Make the tracking simple enough that I'll actually stick with it.

config.problem_text: I eat emotionally when stressed and want to develop better coping strategies
